snippet: HENDLER--Richard. Richard G. Hendler, 86, Boca Raton, Florida, died February 10, 2016 from complications of a brain hemorrhage. He was preceded in death by his parents, Jack and Esther Hendler; a brother, Sherwin Hendler; and his beloved wife, Marcia Silberstein Hendler. He is survived by his three sons, Jeffrey (Doreen), Paul (Shelly), and Steven (Janice); seven grandchildren, Isaac (Alison), Jack (Abby), Eric, Sonia Friedman (David), Sam (Meredith), Matt and Sadye; and four great-granddaughters, Arianna, Eva, Molly and Lily. Also surviving is his cherished life partner, Alma Herman, with whom he shared a most wonderful life together during the last ten years. Funeral, Friday, February 12, 2016, 11:00am, Jewish Community Center, Harrison, New York. The family requests no flowers. Contributions may be made to favorite charity. 1/3
